constraints.description: Mandatory legislation cannot be overridden by agreement
Worse conditions than mandatory legislation cannot be agreed upon
Employment contracts should always be made in writing
For fixed-term employment, trial period is maximum half of the term
Employee termination notice period is 14 days to 1 month
Employer termination requires justified and substantial reason
Employer termination notice period is 14 days to 6 months
Dismissal requires a very substantial reason (e.g. gross negligence)
1+9 rule applies if employment relationship has lasted > 1 month
Safety representative must be selected if workplace has at least 10 employees
Employer may only collect personal information essential for employment under GDPR
Employer contributions (TyEL, unemployment insurance) are significant part of labor costs
